description: This source file defines classes and methods related to text and path parsing within the 'WPEFramework::Core' namespace, including implementation of TextParser and PathParser classes.

classes.name: TextParser
classes.description: A class responsible for parsing text fragments with methods for reading text and navigating within fragments.

classes.name: PathParser
classes.description: A class that parses a file path string into components such as drive, path, filename, extension, and base filename.

methods.name: uint32_t ReadText(const TCHAR delimiters[],const uint32_t offset) const
methods.description: Reads a text segment from the current position up to a delimiter, returning the endpoint index.

methods.name: void ReadText(OptionalType<TextFragment> & result,const TCHAR delimiters[])
methods.description: Reads a text segment into an OptionalType<TextFragment>, updating the result with the parsed fragment.

methods.name: void Parse(const TextFragment & input)
methods.description: Parses a full file path string into its components (drive, path, filename, extension, base filename).

ctags.name: ReadText
ctags.pattern: /^    uint32_t TextParser::ReadText(const TCHAR delimiters[], const uint32_t offset) const$/
